title: The Ornate Mask Points to a Devil Fruit User
summary: The locked room mystery suggests the attacker has a Devil Fruit ability that allows them to bypass physical barriers, such as a door-door fruit or intangibility power.
fullText: The fact that Iceburg was shot in a locked room with no signs of forced entry suggests the perpetrator has special abilities. The ornate mask found at the scene could indicate a Devil Fruit user who can walk through walls, create doors in solid surfaces, or become intangible. This would explain how they entered and left the locked room without breaking in.
author: General Fan Speculation

source.title: Common theory based on locked room mystery genre conventions

title: The World Government is Behind the Attack
summary: Given the suspicion of Corgi and other World Government officials, many fans theorized that the government orchestrated the attack to obtain something from Iceburg or silence him.
fullText: The Galley-La members mention Corgi of the World Government as a suspect. This has led to theories that the World Government is behind the assassination attempt, possibly to obtain the Pluton blueprints that Tom entrusted to Iceburg, or to eliminate someone who knows too much about ancient weapons and the Void Century.
author: General Fan Speculation

source.title: Based on suspicions raised in the episode

title: Franky Family vs Straw Hats Escalation
summary: The destruction of Franky House will escalate into a major conflict that could define the Straw Hats' relationship with Water 7.
fullText: With Franky discovering his house destroyed and learning the Straw Hats are responsible, this sets up a potential major battle. Some fans theorized this conflict would be a significant story arc, possibly leading to Franky becoming either a major antagonist or, conversely, eventually joining forces with the Straw Hats after understanding the full context.
author: General Fan Speculation

title: Aqua Laguna Will Force Resolution
summary: The approaching Aqua Laguna natural disaster will force all parties to work together or make critical decisions under extreme time pressure.
fullText: The announcement of Aqua Laguna arriving at midnight creates a ticking clock for all storylines. Fans theorized that this environmental threat would force characters to make crucial decisions, potentially revealing the true culprit of Iceburg's shooting when everyone is forced to evacuate or take shelter together. The natural disaster could serve as a catalyst for truth and alliance.
author: General Fan Speculation

source.title: Based on the dramatic timing of the Aqua Laguna warning
